attributes.action: Bring petrol and diesel prices down to prices before the war at Ukraine started.
attributes.additional_details: Prices have seen a rise of 20p to 30p per litre making it very expensive for all people to use their transportation to go to work, school runs etc etc
attributes.background: Fund or cut taxes related to petrol and diesel prices so prices can be down to how they were in February 2022

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
